channel.title: How to add handlers for objects?
channel.description: When playing, I see that opening gates and stuff give me handling debug messages in the server. I'm using bulby. Where and how do I handle the stuff? Gates and doors do not work, help is very much appreciated, as i JUST got Castle Wars to work. Or if someone doesn't mine pastebinning their working Bulby ObjectOption1.java that handles everything, that would be nice, too. If you want further information, http://pastebin.com/whPUWwrq is my ObjectOption1.java

item.title: How to add handlers for objects?
item.dc:creator: @Cooldude170 Cooldude170
item.description:
@Cooldude170 wrote:

When playing, I see that opening gates and stuff give me handling debug messages in the server.
I’m using bulby.
Where and how do I handle the stuff?
Gates and doors do not work, help is very much appreciated, as i JUST got Castle Wars to work.
Or if someone doesn’t mine pastebinning their working Bulby ObjectOption1.java that handles everything, that would be nice, too.
If you want further information, http://pastebin.com/whPUWwrq is my ObjectOption1.java
